content:
Logger root, from module zerver.views.registration line 444:
Error generated by Anonymous user (not logged in) on <redact> deployment

No stack trace available

Deployed code:
- ZULIP_VERSION: 1.9.0
- version: 1.9.0


Request info: none

[Django] redact: Error in accounts_home:{'example@email.com': (550, b'5.1.1<
example@email.com>: Recipient address rejected: Userunknown in relay recipient table')}
anyone know how can i troubleshoot what happened here? this was sent to the team email
a user with a wrong email tried to register?

@kyrogue I think https://serverfault.com/questions/570797/recipient-address-rejected-user-unknown-in-relay-recipient-table/570810#570810 is relevant. My guess is that yeah, a user tried to register with the email example@email.com, and your postfix email system is unwilling to deliver emails to that address.
